phrs.translation: [电工学]突波阻抗；特性阻抗；浪涌阻抗

sentences.sentence: At high input impedances, in practice both efficiency and bandwidth of a transformer will reduce.
sentences.translation: 实际上高输入阻抗的变压器，它们的效率和频带宽度都会下降。

sentences.sentence: Carbon nanotube arrays have high current capacities and enable high power gain at low impedances.
sentences.translation: 碳纳米管排列有高电流容量，并能使高功率获得低电阻。

sentences.sentence: Then the impacts of metal case size on the input impedances and patterns of antennas are discussed with the moment method.
sentences.translation: 进而结合实际的天线结构，运用矩量法计算了金属盒大小对天线阻抗和方向图的影响。
